subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: At Fenway Park in 1975, a 23-year-old left-hander with shaky knees, Will McEnaney of the Cincinnati Reds, retired a Hall of Famer, Boston’s Carl Yastrzemski, to win the World Series.
snippet: At Fenway Park in 1975, a 23-year-old left-hander with shaky knees, Will McEnaney of the Cincinnati Reds, retired a Hall of Famer, Boston’s Carl Yastrzemski, to win the World Series.
